Sometimes, no information on frequency is available. In these cases, the sign or symptom may be rare or common.",GARD,Scurvy
What is (are) Permanent neonatal diabetes mellitus ?,"Permanent neonatal diabetes mellitus (PNDB) is a type of diabetes that appears within the first 6 months of life and persists throughout life.
